criteria_descriptions.is_invalid_image_quality: The image presents good resolution, and all textual and photographic fields are clearly legible.
criteria_descriptions.is_wrong_document_type: The document shown is a Brazilian identity document compatible with official formats.
criteria_descriptions.is_document_forged: No evidence of digital editing, compositing, or layout inconsistencies is observed.
criteria_descriptions.is_name_mismatch: Name on the document matches the input name. No name mismatch detected.
criteria_descriptions.is_document_number_mismatch: Document number on the image matches the input value. No number mismatch detected.
criteria_descriptions.is_birthdate_mismatch: Birthdate on the document matches the input value. No date mismatch detected.
